subject: Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Horse Racing
Strikes
Organized Labor
lead_paragraph: The president of the New York Racing Association said the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes on Saturday would go off in perfect order even if maintenance and starting gate workers strike, as they have threatened.
snippet: The president of the New York Racing Association said the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes on Saturday would go off in perfect order even if maintenance and starting gate workers strike, as they have threatened.
